title: Hmm Vayne or Cassiopeia, opinions on who's funner ?
body:
First things first, I like dishing out TONS OF DAMAGE.

I consider myself good at predicting movement, and I find kiting pretty easy too and I only have two champions for mid and adc so.

Honestly couldn't give a crap about skilcap cos I'm willing to train.

Finally my favourites are {{champion:103}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:21}} 

(yes I did get the idea from the post somewhere below me)

replies.body:
Vayne's kiting potential is amazing. You can make mistakes and still get away with it.  Vayne is mechanically hard but rewarding if your support always peels for you.

But cassiopeia, she is a monster. It's fairly hard to kite with Cassiopeia, but with enough practice you can 1 v 1 almost anyone. She is a late game hyper carry (like vayne) that doesn't exactly need babysitting (but can be bursted down if caught out). Her ult is a tad hard to effectively land and has a weird hitbox (however, it can make or break a team fight and is greate for initiating, engaging, re-engaging and disengaging)

 In short, Cassiopeia works well with any team comp (especially people who can initiate and disengage well) and she is also considered as the "vayne of mid laners". Play smart and jesus, you can deny farm, exp to your enemy mid laner and make them cry.

Add me in game if you want to learn Cassiopeia! I main her in ranked! Can give you a few pointers here and there :D

Sweeeet. I might get Vayne first because I'm pretty much tied right now and I need to broaden up my adc pool but I'll add you !

One thing though, can Cassiopeia's ultimate interupt Katarina's ultimate ?

Even though Kat is visuall spinning it considers her to be facing whichever way she was facing when she hit R - for the Cass ultimate - but most Kat players will Right click away from you then instantly hit R so they aren't facing you so you have like 0 chance.
what? you like vayne and dealing damage? congrats you are 90% of the league community

So I might go with Vayne, she does seem more funner, but it was extremely close because immobility isn't a problem for me and I looove that cass ult.

Thanks for the input guys :D

-If you are good at kiting going anyone of them is good
-{{champion:69}} have quite a lot of skill shots but {{champion:67}} doesn't have any except maybe her condemn
-Both have great late game
-{{champion:69}} is immobile but {{champion:67}}  is pretty mobile with her Q (Tumble)
-Cassiopeia is a lane bully but vayne gets bullied in lane
-both of them have high skill cap.

Both champs have their ups and downs. Cass can deal insane burst damage is has an extremely useful ult that can turn a team fight in your favour. Vayne has high dps and great kiting potential. With proper positioning you can perform really well in team fights. I personally prefer Vayne over Cass out of these two because of the play potential of Vayne over Cass. But that's my own opinion.

Vayne hands down the most fun. Probably one of the most fun champs in the game.

Cass is fun to play every so often, but she can be punished really hard because she is so immobile. Has probably one of the strongest level 2's in the game and can all-in almost anyone if you take ignite and hit level 2 first.

But I prefer Vayne between the 2.
